    <script>
	if (top.location != self.location) {
	  top.location = self.location
        }

        function setCookie2(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
            const d = new Date();
            d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
            let expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
            document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
        }
        function getCookie2(cname) {
            let name = cname + "=";
            let decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
            let ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
            for (let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                let c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                    c = c.substring(1);
                }
                if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                    return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
                }
            }
            return "";
        }
        function tryOpenPopup() {
            let alreadyOpened = getCookie2("suggestionRequestPopup");
            if (alreadyOpened == undefined || alreadyOpened == "") {
                openForm();
            }
        }
        function openForm() {
            document.getElementById("popupForm").style.display = "block";
        }

        function closeForm() {
            setCookie2("suggestionRequestPopup", true, 365);
            document.getElementById("popupForm").style.display = "none";
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function preview(hbid)
        {
            return overlib('<img width=300 border="0" src="' 
                + 'https://beta.hebrewbooks.org/pagepngs/' + hbid + '_1_300_0.png" />'
            ,BGCLASS,'sysBorderDark',TEXTPADDING,0,BORDER,0
            ,WIDTH,300, LEFT,OFFSETX,40,OFFSETY,-80);
        }
        function setPagingBehavior(src)
        {
            callServer('generic.aspx?browsepaging='+src.checked,'','dummy','');            
        }
        function dummy()
        {
        }
    </script>
